featured.text: While the Iron Curtain was still in place under the communist government, Prague was ＿29＿ visited by foreigners.
Situated on both banks of the winding River Vltava, Prague is like one big open-air museum.

definition.zh_def: 捷克共和國的首都，以其歷史悠久的建築和文化遺產而聞名。
definition.en_def: The capital of the Czech Republic, known for its historic architecture and cultural heritage.
definition.example: I visited Prague last summer and was amazed by its beautiful castles.
